entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h diminishing to 20 early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
